content: shows the picked-up and knitted stitches fig 2 horn space b a b a rhino s left side cast on edge cast on edge fig 3 fig 1 baby rhino page 8 baby rhino page 9 forehead short row 5 k11 w+tk rs and cast-on edge facing you slip rhino s left side stitches on your short row 6 p10 w+tp right off the safety pin and onto the knitting needle ready to knit short row 7 k9 w+tk across rejoin yarn a knit across all 11 left side sts then slip right short row 8 p8 w+tp side stitches off the safety pin and onto the knitting needle ready to knit short row 9 k7 w+tk across knit across all 11 right side sts - 22sts short row 10 p6 w+tp short row 11 k12 to end of row row 1 ws purl row 13 purl row 2 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 24sts cut yarn slip all 18 head back sts onto the circular needle row 3 purl row 4-5 increase repeat last 2 row once - 26sts join nose seam pm place marker at on stitch at each end of last purl row for left and ws together fold the nose cast-on edge in half work mattress stitch to right neck markers join the nose seam joining both sides of the folded cast-on edge see fig 4 join along as dotted line shows row 6 decrease k8 skpo k6 k2tog k8 to end of row - 24sts row 7 9 & 11 purl row 8 decrease k7 skpo k6 k2tog k7 to end of row - 22sts row 10 decrease k6 skpo k6 k2tog k6 to end of row - 20sts row 12 decrease k5 skpo k6 k2tog k5 to end of row - 18sts x y row 13 purl work short row to shape head back as follows short row 1 k16 w+tk short row 2 p14 w+tp head back short row 3 k13 w+tk stitches short row 4 p12 w+tp fig 4 baby rhino page 10 baby rhino page 11 upper inner mouth join inside mouth seam rs and rhino s right-side neck marker facing you begin near the ws together fold the inside mouth cast-off edge in half and mattress marker with yarn b pick up and knit 9 sts evenly across the right stitch side row ends to nose seam the ninth stitch being picked up at the to join the two halves seam pick up and knit 8 sts evenly along left side row ends to the push the inside mouth in and under the muzzle no need to sew in place left-side neck marker see fig 5 pick up as dotted lines show from a see fig 6 - 17sts to b b to c - 17sts row 1 3 & 5 purl row 2 decrease k4 skpo k5 k2tog k4 to end of row - 15sts horn row 4 decrease k4 skpo k3 k2tog k4 to end
